intro: Ozoroa dekindtiana, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers that are typically purple or violet in color. Its leaves are usually rounded and velvety, contributing to its ornamental appeal. Ozoroa dekindtiana is popular as a houseplant due to its ability to thrive in low-light conditions and its long blooming period.
